00012 #include"adf_err.h"
00013 
00014 extern struct Env adfEnv;
00015 
00016 /*
00017  * myInitDevice
00018  *
00019  * must fill 'dev->size'
00020  */
00021 RETCODE myInitDevice(struct Device* dev, char* name,BOOL ro)
00022 {
00023     struct nativeDevice* nDev;
00024 
00025     nDev = (struct nativeDevice*)dev->nativeDev;
00026 
00027     nDev = (struct nativeDevice*)malloc(sizeof(struct nativeDevice));
00028     if (!nDev) {
00029         (*adfEnv.eFct)("myInitDevice : malloc");
00030         return RC_ERROR;
00031     }
00032     dev->nativeDev = nDev;
00033     if (!ro)
00034         /* check if device is writable, if not, force readOnly to TRUE */
00035         dev->readOnly = FALSE;
00036     else
00037         /* mount device as read only */
00038         dev->readOnly = TRUE;
00039 
00040     dev->size = 0;
00041 
00042     return RC_OK;
00043 }
00044 
00045

00047  * myReadSector
00048  *
00049  */
00050 RETCODE myReadSector(struct Device *dev, long n, int size, unsigned char* buf)
00051 {
00052      return RC_OK;   
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 /*
00057  * myWriteSector
00058  *
00059  */
00060 RETCODE myWriteSector(struct Device *dev, long n, int size, unsigned char* buf)
00061 {
00062     return RC_OK;
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 /*
00067  * myReleaseDevice
00068  *
00069  * free native device
00070  */
00071 RETCODE myReleaseDevice(struct Device *dev)
00072 {
00073     struct nativeDevice* nDev;
00074 
00075     nDev = (struct nativeDevice*)dev->nativeDev;
00076 
00077     free(nDev);
00078 
00079     return RC_OK;
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 /*
00084  * adfInitNativeFct
00085  *
00086  */
00087 void adfInitNativeFct()
00088 {
00089     struct nativeFunctions *nFct;
00090 
00091     nFct = (struct nativeFunctions*)adfEnv.nativeFct;
00092 
00093     nFct->adfInitDevice = myInitDevice ;
00094     nFct->adfNativeReadSector = myReadSector ;
00095     nFct->adfNativeWriteSector = myWriteSector ;
00096     nFct->adfReleaseDevice = myReleaseDevice ;
00097     nFct->adfIsDevNative = myIsDevNative;
00098 }

00101 /*
00102  * myIsDevNative
00103  *
00104  */
00105 BOOL myIsDevNative(char *devName)
00106 {
00107     return (strncmp(devName,"/dev/",5)==0);
00108 }
